reason: This letter, written by 'Dork', discusses organizing a play ('gotteskind') and other personal news. Page 1 (827C8FD5...) dated Sept 19, 55, asks for the play script via airmail. Page 2 (EA93F742...), dated Oct 10, 55, confirms the script's arrival and lists the cast. Page 3 (EED86E5E...) continues from the previous page, discussing the challenges of the play's dialect and mentioning evening classes. Page 4 (F2FEC3D0...) describes a recent wedding of Inge and Klaus, who are mentioned in the play context. Page 5 (2C59B68D...) continues from the wedding description, talks about a new apartment, and lists Christmas wishes, which fits the timeline approaching the end of the year.
